trans-unit.source: Maintains the registration of all access keys and the handling of interop keyboard commands between Windows Forms, Win32, and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: 維護所有便捷鍵的註冊，以及 Windows Forms、Win32 與 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 之間 Interop 鍵盤命令的處理。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> object is created on demand with one per <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>依每一個要求建立物件<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> is attached as an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> and exposes methods to <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A> access keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>附加的事件處理常式為<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>公開方法，以和<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A>存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: When the registered access key is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> calls the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> method on the target element.
trans-unit.target: 按下的已註冊的存取金鑰時，<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A>目標項目上的方法。

trans-unit.source: An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以與任意數目的存取金鑰相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> 附加事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The presentation source to query for <c>key</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要從中查詢 <c>key</c> 的呈現來源。

trans-unit.source: The key to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified key is registered as an access keys in the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的按鍵是否已註冊為指定範圍內的便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵已註冊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The scope for the access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if <c>key</c> has multiple matches.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>key</c> 是否有多個相符項目。

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified access keys as if a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event for the key was passed to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 處理指定的便捷鍵，就像已將索引鍵的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 事件傳遞給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager" /> 一樣。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there are more keys that match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有多個相符的按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: The element to associate <c>key</c> with.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>key</c> 相關聯的元素。

trans-unit.source: Associates the specified access keys with the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的存取金鑰與指定的項目建立關聯。

trans-unit.source: When the access keys is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> method of `element` is called.
trans-unit.target: 按下便捷鍵時，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A>方法`element`呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以與任意數目的存取金鑰相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> event handler from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的物件中移除指定的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to disassociate <c>key</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要取消 <c>key</c> 關聯的元素。

trans-unit.source: Disassociates the specified access keys from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取消指定的存取金鑰與指定的項目之間的關聯。
